item.gems.tracker_compass.desc: Right-click to pick a player; tracks last seen + respawn coords and points toward them.
item.gems.recall_relic.desc: Right-click to mark a spot; reuse to return (consumes the mark).
item.gems.hypno_staff.desc: Hold the beam for 3s to temporarily control mobs (except blacklisted).
item.gems.earthsplitter_pick.desc: Right-click to toggle 9x9x3 or 20x2x3 mining (Silk Touch applies to all blocks).
item.gems.supreme_helmet.desc: Supreme set: Night Vision + Water Breathing.
item.gems.blood_oath_blade.desc: Gains +1 Sharpness per unique player kill (cap X).
item.gems.demolition_blade.desc: Right-click to arm a demolition charge on your target.
item.gems.hunters_sight_bow.desc: Aim assist toward your last hit target within range.
item.gems.third_strike_blade.desc: Every 3rd crit in a 5s chain deals bonus damage.
screen.gems.gem_trader.title: Gem Trader
screen.gems.purchase.title: Gem Purchase
screen.gems.gem_trader.hint: Pick a gem to activate. Trading consumes a Gem Trader.
screen.gems.purchase.hint: Pick any gem to add. Purchasing consumes a Gem Purchase Token.

gems.screen.guidebook.title: Guidebook
gems.book.gems.title: Gems Overview
gems.book.gems.body: A quick overview of gem selection, energy tiers, abilities, and passives.
gems.book.controls.title: Controls & HUD
gems.book.controls.body: Keybinds, chord vs custom controls, bonus screens, and HUD options.
gems.book.synergies.title: Synergies
gems.book.synergies.body: Team synergy combos, trust requirements, and how triggers work.
gems.book.advanced.title: Advanced Systems
gems.book.advanced.body: Loadout presets, augments, legendary inscriptions, and other advanced features.
gems.book.legendary.title: Legendary Items
gems.book.legendary.body: Legendary item behaviors, inscriptions, and special effects.
gems.book.progression.title: Progression
gems.book.progression.body: Energy progression, unlock tiers, and mastery progression.
gems.book.recipes.title: Recipes
gems.book.recipes.body: Crafting recipes for gems, augments, and legendary items.
gems.book.mastery.title: Mastery
gems.book.mastery.body: Mastery tracks, titles, auras, and usage thresholds.
gems.book.rivalry.title: Rivalry
gems.book.rivalry.body: Rivalry targets, bonus damage, and reroll rules.
gems.book.trust.title: Trust & Ownership
gems.book.trust.body: Trust lists, ownership rules, and who can interact with your items.
item.gems.gem_seer.desc: Right-click to view any known player's gem info.
item.gems.experience_blade.desc: Consume XP to gain Sharpness (10->II, 20->IV, 30->VI, max XX at 100 levels).
item.gems.duelists_rapier.desc: Right-click for parry window; successful parry grants guaranteed crit.
item.gems.reversal_mirror.desc: Right-click to reflect all incoming damage back for 5 seconds.
item.gems.hunters_trophy_necklace.desc: Steal passives from other players and keep them permanently.
item.gems.gladiators_mark.desc: Brand a player; both deal 50% more damage to each other for 60s.
item.gems.soul_shackle.desc: Link to an enemy; damage you take is split between you for 10s.
item.gems.challengers_gauntlet.desc: Challenge a player to a duel arena; winner gains energy.
gems.item.chrono_charm.tooltip.1: Cooldowns tick twice as fast while carried.

gems.synergy.thunderstorm.desc: Fire + Flux: Lightning strikes your target location
gems.synergy.soul_exchange.desc: Life + Reaper: Participants swap health percentages
gems.synergy.warp_drive.desc: Speed + Space: Teleport forward with massive speed boost
gems.synergy.warcry.desc: Strength + Terror: Gain strength, enemies get fear
gems.synergy.phantom_strike.desc: Spy + Astra: Become invisible with bonus damage
gems.synergy.radiant_restoration.desc: Beacon + Life: Massive healing for you and allies
gems.synergy.cyclone.desc: Air + Puff: Create a vortex that pulls and launches enemies
gems.synergy.pack_alpha.desc: Summoner + Hunter: Strength boost and night vision for hunting
gems.synergy.plunder.desc: Pillager + Wealth: Massive luck boost for better drops
gems.synergy.plunder.active: Plunder active - enemies will drop extra loot!
gems.synergy.guardians_challenge.desc: Duelist + Sentinel: Massive defense, enemies become visible
gems.synergy.reality_warp.desc: Trickster + Chaos: Random effects on all nearby players
gems.synergy.plasma_lance.desc: Fireball + Flux Beam: Piercing plasma corridor with explosions
gems.synergy.stellar_cataclysm.desc: Meteor Shower + Orbital Laser: Fire rain and lightning impact
gems.synergy.gravity_weave.desc: Gravity Field + Slipstream: Allies surge forward, enemies are pulled
gems.synergy.shadow_relay.desc: Smoke Bomb + Glitch Step: Blink behind an enemy and cripple them
gems.synergy.blood_convergence.desc: Blood Charge + Life Circle: Drain foes and supercharge allies
gems.synergy.singularity_ignition.desc: Fireball + Black Hole: Pull and incinerate enemies
gems.synergy.sanctuary_pulse.desc: Vitality Vortex + Beacon Regen Aura: Cleanse and massive heal
gems.synergy.reaping_snare.desc: Scythe Sweep + Net Shot: Root and wither
gems.synergy.alpha_swarm.desc: Summon Slot 1 + Call the Pack: Pack frenzy
gems.synergy.siegebreak.desc: Breach Charge + Warhorn: Blast and debuff
gems.synergy.overclock.desc: Flux Surge + Tempo Shift: Burst cooldowns for allies
gems.synergy.vacuum_reversal.desc: White Hole + Gust: Blast enemies away
gems.synergy.sonic_uppercut.desc: Breezy Bash + Terminal Velocity: Launch and slam
gems.synergy.judgment_field.desc: Orbital Laser + Lockdown: Mark and slow enemies
gems.synergy.ember_chain.desc: Heat Haze + Remote Charge: Burning suppression
gems.synergy.shadow_barrage.desc: Shadow Clone + Astral Daggers: Arcane barrage
gems.synergy.harvest_tide.desc: Health Drain + Retribution: Drain and shield
gems.synergy.stormbreaker.desc: Flux Beam + Vindicator Break: Armor crack
gems.synergy.celestial_stride.desc: Gravity Field + Air Dash: Warp stride
gems.synergy.iron_chorus.desc: Beacon Resistance Aura + Rally Cry: Team fortification
gems.inscription.edge.desc: Boosts attack damage while holding the legendary
gems.inscription.swift.desc: Boosts attack and move speed while holding the legendary
gems.inscription.ward.desc: Boosts armor while holding the legendary
gems.augment.need_legendary: Hold a legendary item in your other hand.
